title: Bonjour Balwyn
creator_contributor_role: Experimental Film Fund, Australia Council for the Arts, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Publishers and publishing
abstract: A young man's futile attempts to publish a trendy magazine in Carlton.
description: A feature film about a young man's futile attempt to publish a trendy magazine in Carlton. When his efforts begin to fail, he must turn to petty crime to help make ends meet. Stars John Duigan and Peter Cummins.
